p:
According to a report by Zarshenas and Krenn, 12 studies have been carried out in the analysis of Salvia mirzayanii up to 2015. Major compounds were found to be Î±-terpinyl acetate, linalyl acetate, 8-acetoxy linalool, spathulenol, linalool, 5-neo-cedranol, and eudesm-7(11)en-4-ol, while 1,8-cineole was reported in moderate amounts in 2 studies.
17
